rooms.description: A spacious living room with Mediterranean accents featuring stone finishes and terracotta tiles.
An open dining area integrated with the kitchen for family gatherings, incorporating natural elements like wood and stone.
A master bedroom with a private ensuite bathroom, designed following Vastu principles to enhance positive energy flow.
An additional bedroom, spacious and airy, incorporating Mediterranean style decor with warm color palettes.
A guest bedroom ensuring comfort while respecting Vastu alignment for relaxation.
Another bedroom designed with an emphasis on light and ventilation, following Mediterranean design cues.
Dedicated servant's quarters including a small kitchenette and bathroom, ensuring privacy while following local building norms.
A home theater with soundproofing and ambient lighting to provide an immersive entertainment experience. Designed in line with Mediterranean aesthetics.

openings.description: Stately front door leading into the living area.
Access to a private balcony and garden space, ensuring adherence to Vastu principles of entry.
Large patio windows providing natural light while maintaining privacy.
Service entrance for servants' quarters with separate access to maintain security and privacy.
